_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_LISTPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, LISTPRICE_USD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_EUR DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_CAD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_CNY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_JPY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_KRW DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_BRL DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_TWD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_PLN DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_RON DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_RUB DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_EGP DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_GBP DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_TRY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_ILS DECIMAL(20,5), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_LISTPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: select lp.catentry_id catentry_id, lp.currency currency, lp.listprice listprice from listprice lp, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE where lp.catentry_id = ce.catentry_id AND lp.currency in (?currencyCode?) AND CE.CATENTTYPE_ID <> 'BundleBean' order by catentry_id, currency

_config:property.name: currencyCode
_config:property.value: USD, EUR, CAD, CNY, JPY, KRW, BRL, TWD, PLN, RON, RUB, EGP, GBP, TRY, ILS

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_LBUNDLEPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, LISTPRICE_USD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_EUR DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_CAD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_CNY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_JPY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_KRW DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_BRL DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_TWD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_PLN DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_RON DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_RUB DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_EGP DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_GBP DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_TRY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_ILS DECIMAL(20,5), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_LBUNDLEPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_USD) LISTPRICE_USD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_EUR) LISTPRICE_EUR, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_CAD) LISTPRICE_CAD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_CNY) LISTPRICE_CNY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_JPY) LISTPRICE_JPY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_KRW) LISTPRICE_KRW, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_BRL) LISTPRICE_BRL, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_TWD) LISTPRICE_TWD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_PLN) LISTPRICE_PLN, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_RON) LISTPRICE_RON, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_RUB) LISTPRICE_RUB, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_EGP) LISTPRICE_EGP, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_GBP) LISTPRICE_GBP, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_TRY) LISTPRICE_TRY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_ILS) LISTPRICE_ILS FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# ITEM, CATENTREL, TI_LISTPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# LP WHERE CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=ITEM.CATENTRY_ID AND ITEM.CATENTRY_ID=LP.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATRELTYPE_ID='BUNDLE_COMPONENT' AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# BUNDLE WHERE BUNDLE.CATENTRY_ID=CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) GROUP BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT ORDER BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_LDKITPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, LISTPRICE_USD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_EUR DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_CAD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_CNY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_JPY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_KRW DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_BRL DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_TWD DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_PLN DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_RON DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_RUB DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_EGP DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_GBP DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_TRY DECIMAL(20,5), LISTPRICE_ILS DECIMAL(20,5), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_LDKITPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_USD) LISTPRICE_USD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_EUR) LISTPRICE_EUR, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_CAD) LISTPRICE_CAD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_CNY) LISTPRICE_CNY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_JPY) LISTPRICE_JPY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_KRW) LISTPRICE_KRW, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_BRL) LISTPRICE_BRL, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_TWD) LISTPRICE_TWD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_PLN) LISTPRICE_PLN, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_RON) LISTPRICE_RON, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_RUB) LISTPRICE_RUB, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_EGP) LISTPRICE_EGP, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_GBP) LISTPRICE_GBP, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_TRY) LISTPRICE_TRY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_ILS) LISTPRICE_ILS FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CHILD, DKPDCCATENTREL, DKPDCCOMPLIST, TI_LISTPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# LP WHERE CHILD.CATENTRY_ID=DKPDCCOMPLIST.CATENTRY_ID AND DKPDCCOMPLIST.DKPREDEFCONF_ID=DKPDCCATENTREL.DKPREDEFCONF_ID AND LP.CATENTRY_ID=CHILD.CATENTRY_ID AND DKPDCCATENTREL.SEQUENCE=0 AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# DYNAMICKIT WHERE DYNAMICKIT.CATENTRY_ID=DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID AND DYNAMICKIT.CATENTTYPE_ID='DynamicKitBean' ) GROUP BY DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID) UNION (SELECT CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_USD) LISTPRICE_USD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_EUR) LISTPRICE_EUR, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_CAD) LISTPRICE_CAD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_CNY) LISTPRICE_CNY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_JPY) LISTPRICE_JPY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_KRW) LISTPRICE_KRW, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_BRL) LISTPRICE_BRL, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_TWD) LISTPRICE_TWD, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_PLN) LISTPRICE_PLN, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_RON) LISTPRICE_RON, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_RUB) LISTPRICE_RUB, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_EGP) LISTPRICE_EGP, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_GBP) LISTPRICE_GBP, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_TRY) LISTPRICE_TRY, SUM(LP.LISTPRICE_ILS) LISTPRICE_ILS FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# PDC, CATENTREL, TI_LISTPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# LP WHERE CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT=PDC.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=LP.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTREL.CATRELTYPE_ID='PDK_COMPONENT' GROUP BY CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID_PARENT
